attributes.action: Increase carers allowance to a fair wage, including people paying a pension.
attributes.additional_details: Use legal minimum wage. It’s unacceptable
attributes.background: Reevaluate the wage of carers allowance. £67 a week is disgusting.people have to give up work to care,this is slave labour. If a care agency had to pay to look after a person it would cost the government thousands a month. Is this the amount a carer should get a month,no break or a lunch hour??

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase Carer's Allowance to equal 35hrs at National Minimum Wage: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617874

Pay Carer's Allowance in addition to any other benefits or state pension: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612708
